title: Minneapolis - Peaceful, Eco-Friendly, Urban Living
posting_body: ['Available 9/24/22', 'Just south of downtown Minneapolis, only 8 blocks from US bank stadium, with easy access to multiple metro transit bus lines, this unit is a spacious one-bedroom apartment in a clean, quiet, and newly renovated building.', 'This 600 sqft unit features a patio, laminate hardwood flooring, and new hardwood cabinets.', 'This property also includes an on-site workout facility , free high-efficiency laundry on the 2nd, 3rd and 4th floors, an out door grilling and picnic area, and a thriving community garden in the adjacent lot.', 'Join our eco-friendly community and live in a peaceful building while still having easy access to the busy city!', 'To learn more about us, schedule a showing, or apply, visit: <URL>', 'Included Amenities:', 'Wifi', 'Electric vehicle charging station', 'Bike storage and workspace', 'On-site laundry', 'Elevator', 'Locally made soaps (laundry, personal soaps, tub and tile)', 'Gym', 'Metal, textile, lighting, electronics, plastic bag, styrofoam recycling', 'On counter composter and compost bags', 'Eco-friendly toilet paper, LED light bulbs, and compostable dog waste bags', 'Utilities paid by tenant:', 'Electricity', 'Utilities paid by owner:', 'Trash & compost, gas, water, internet', 'Off-street lot parking spaces and large storage units are available on a first-come, first-serve basis for an additional monthly fee.', 'This property is pet-friendly, both cats and dogs are allowed with management approval, pet deposit, and pet rent.', 'Garden spaces available for a small fee.', 'This unit is part of the Minneapolis 4D program.', 'This means that rent is economical to households making less than 60% of Area Median Income (AMI).', 'According to these standards, maximum rents for 2022-2023, 1 bedroom units is $1,320 and applicants must make less than the following amounts to be eligible:', '$49,320 for one person', '$55,340 for two people', '$63,360 for three people', '$70,380 for four people', '$76,020 for five people', 'More information about the 4D program: https://www2.minneapolismn.gov/government/programs-initiatives/housing-development-assistance/rental-property/4d/', 'Green Rock Apartments:', 'Green Rock Apartments is a small property management firm focused on eco-conscious urban living.', 'We have been in operation since 1991.', 'Our mission is to provide safe, comfortable, and eco-friendly living spaces that foster healthy, sustainable communities.', 'To learn more about us, view availability, or schedule a showing visit: <URL>/']
